tool_description: Zip Code API with enhanced data model for each US zip code plus endpoints to get list of zip codes in radius, distance between zip codes and metro statistical areas details.
name: US Zip Code API
title: US Zip Code API

api_list.name: List all Zip Codes
api_list.description: Returns a list of zip codes. Results are always paginated.  Several querystring parameters are available for searching and filtering.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to return in each page.

optional_parameters.name: zipcode
optional_parameters.description: 5 Digit Zip Code query parameter. Can have multiple values (separated by comma).

optional_parameters.name: uspsCarrierRouteSortCode
optional_parameters.description: Parameter for carrier route sort code.

optional_parameters.name: uniqueZipNameInd
optional_parameters.description: Parameter for unique zip name indicator.

optional_parameters.name: uspsMainCityKey
optional_parameters.description: Parameter for USPS City / Town key identifier for the main city of the zip code.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset is the position in the dataset to start retrieval of records.

api_list.name: Distance Between 2 Zip Codes
api_list.description: Gets the distance (in miles and kilometers) between 2 zip codes passed as parameters. There are 2 mandatory query parameters (zipCode1 and zipCode2).

api_list.name: Metro/Micro Statistical Area Details
api_list.description: Gets the details of a single Metropolitan Statistical Area code passed as a path parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com/zipc/v1/msagroups/11580"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com/zipc/v1/msagroups/{msacode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

count.description: Total number of records of the response. Note: the data object always has a limit number of records retrieved.

msaName.description: Name of the defined MSA code.

states.description: Array with states and counties that make up MSA Group

stateFipsCode.description: Federal Information Processing Standards 2 digit assigned code.

counties.description: Array with counties related to MSA group in the state.

countyFipsCode.description: FIPS code assigned to the county of the main city of the zip code.

uspsCountyName.description: Name of the county of the main city for the zip code USPS Standard.

api_list.name: Ping Service
api_list.description: Endpoint used to validate service . Returns 204 on Success
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com/zipc/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com/zipc/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Zip Code Radius
api_list.description: Endpoint that returns the zip codes that fall within the specified radius of another zip code. The returned zip codes are sorted by distance.

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: Radius distance.  Max 322 km or 200 mi

api_list.name: List All MSA Groups
api_list.description: This end point lists all the Metropolitan and Micropolitan Statistical Areas in the United States with the corresponding states and counties that make up the group.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to return in each page. Max value: 50.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset is the position in the dataset to start retrieval of records.

api_list.name: Zip Code Details
api_list.description: Gets the details of a single Zip code.
